question: Hey, did you see how Jerry's arm just twitched like a popcorn kernel popping in a microwave?
Yeah, he's not having a muscle spasm, he's practicing his popping! Looks like he's getting good at it!
You know how Jack-in-the-box jumps out really fast and then freezes? I feel like doing that with my whole body when this song comes on!
That's exactly what popping is! Quick, abrupt movements followed by a freeze. You're a natural!
This beat makes me want to pretend I'm a robot with a loose wire, glitching and twitching with the rhythm!
Well, you're talking about popping, my friend! Those quick, jerky movements are the essence of it.
Did you hear about the disco dancer who couldn't stop freezing in place?
No, what happened?
Turns out they were just practicing their locking moves!
Why did the dancer bring a padlock to the dance-off?
I don't know, why?
Because they wanted to show off their locking skills!
Why did the hip hop dancer bring a lock to the dance-off?
Oh, to show off their locking moves, of course!
Ever seen a dancing robot freeze in place on the dance floor?
Yep, that's called locking in hip hop dance!
Why don't hip hop dancers make good locksmiths?
Because they're always locking but never unlocking!
Why was the hip-hop dancer good at handling fragile packages?
Because they know all about breaking...but never break anything!
Why did the hip-hop dancer bring a hammer to the dance-off?
I guess they wanted to break it down literally and figuratively!
Why was the hip-hop dancer asked to leave the china shop?
Because the owner was afraid they'd start breaking!
Did you hear about the hip-hop dancer who became a farmer?
Yeah, they specialize in Booga-loose leaf lettuce!
Why was the hip-hop dancer always welcome at parties?
Because they always bring the Boogaloo-se vibes!
Why did the hip-hop dancer bring a flashlight to the dance-off?
So they could Boogaloo-k their best!
Why did the hip-hop dancer get kicked out of the bakery?
He kept Krumping the bread!
Why did the hip-hop dancer go to the gym?
She's working on her Krump-ling strength!
What do you call a hip-hop dancer who's a gardener?
A Krump-kin patch specialist!
Why did the hip-hop dancer bring a compass to the dance-off?
Because he didn't want to lose his direction while Freestyling!
Why did the hip-hop dancer stop practicing in the mirror?
She wanted to make sure her Freestyling was a real reflection of herself!
Why did the hip-hop dancer start a cooking show?
She was great at Freestyling both on the dance floor and in the kitchen!
